entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Bump Mono.TextTemplating from 2.2.1 to 2.3.1 #30512
  • Is MigrationsAssembly when using a seperate migration project if you aren't migrating in your app #30510
  • InvalidCastException: Unable to cast object of type 7.0.4 #30506
  • InfrastructureExtensions GetService throws an error. #30504
  • Migrations fails since EF Core 7.0.4 #30503
  • Nullable Model Differences between EF Core 6 -> EF Core 7 #30502
  • Cannot find module './en.js' ; Zone: <root> ; Task: Promise.then ; Value: Error: Cannot find module './en.js' #30499
  • Navigation Property with backing fields can't work in Lazy Load mode #30498
  • Configure computed database property values using expressions #30496

Closed

  • Simplified and quick database migrations #30456
  • @pawansingh168 this doesn't seem to be related to EF Core in any way, but rather an Angular/Javascript issue. If you believe this is related to EF, please paste a runnable, minimal code sample showing what's going on. #30507
  • @pawansingh168 this doesn't seem to be related to EF Core in any way, but rather an Angular/Javascript issue. If you believe this is related to EF, please paste a runnable, minimal code sample showing what's going on. #30508
  • @pawansingh168 this doesn't seem to be related to EF Core in any way, but rather an Angular/Javascript issue. If you believe this is related to EF, please paste a runnable, minimal code sample showing what's going on. #30509
  • Defining a navigation to another table in an Owned Type #30500
  • Scaffold-DbContext fails: System.InvalidOperationException: The key {'DocumentTypeId'} cannot be added to keyless type 'DocumentType (Dictionary<string, object>)'. #30448
  • SqlQuery doesn't support scalar values but works with unmapped types #30447
  • Should consider saving any type as text or JSON text. #30361
  • SQL Server: Set operations should work if normalized store type is the same #29020
    8.0.0-preview3
  • 生成的模型中get、set访问器问题（The generated model get, set accessor problem） #30497
  • How does ChangeTracker know that something was changed? #30490

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix bad merge. #30511
  • Bump Newtonsoft.Json from 13.0.2 to 13.0.3 #30465
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Fix to #30358 - Duplicate table alias in generated select query (An item with the same key has already been added) #30486
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.6
